scripts.k6:index: docker run --rm --network host -i grafana/k6 run --vus 10 --duration 10s - < index.js
scripts.k6:send: docker run --rm --network host -i grafana/k6 run --vus 10 --duration 10s - < send.js
scripts.k6:redirect: docker run --rm --network host -i grafana/k6 run --vus 10 --duration 10s - < redirect.js
scripts.k6:random: docker run --rm --network host -i grafana/k6 run --vus 10 --duration 10s - < random.js
